post:
Servage Hosting is a well established german webhoster with customers in more then 100 countries. We take environmental responsibility by hosting our customers in a climate smart datacenter in Sweden and it is our goal to serve our customers while always keeping our systems up-to-date with the most modern technologies and hardware.

Our services for you:

  • One free domain
  • Unlimited Bandwidth
  • Unlimited E-Mail accounts
  • Unlimited Subdomains
  • Unlimited Databases
  • free Let’s Encrypt
  • SSH Access
  • application installer for Wordpress (and many more tools)
  • 24/7 real ticket- and chat support
  • 200 GB disc space
  • climate smart server location within the European Union (Sweden)
  • much, much more

Sign up NOW for our 12 months webhosting plan and get the package for $35.88 (without VAT).

Discount Code: SERGNKGHP
Sign up page: https://store.servage.net/?ccy=USD

In case of any questions or remarks, just send an email to support@servage.net. We get back to you as soon as possible.

Terms and conditions:
This discount code is valid until 2020-10-01. It applies to new customers and for the sign up period of the webhosting plan only. For renewals after the first period, the regular price, which can be found on store.servage.net, applies. The price mentioned is excluding VAT. If the new customer is subject to VAT, its local VAT will be added.
